评论详情: I was not expecting these to be the material they are. I had read through reviews and saw “buttery soft” as a description in which this is what I was wanting. I would not describe the feel as buttery soft. These feel like swimsuit material. I feel like I’m going to go surfing in these. I’m probably sending back but it has peaked my curiosity to how these would hold up as a modest swim pants lol. And I’m partially tempted to keep to find it lol  They also do not feel like they breathe easily. I’m a very textile type of person and I’m not fond of the material at all. It feels like plastic on my legs. I was wanting more of a comfy, around the house, knit pair of leggings. These are definitely designed more for working out. But I have concerns about how well they breathe. I only tried on so I can’t say if they do breath or not.  If I liked this type of material, I might like these. For this specific type of material, it feels like a higher quality. The fit is very nice. I am a plus size and many brands get super wonky on the sizing for plus. The size runs similar to Torrid sizing. It feels like it has a little bit of tummy control in the front. Nothing too terribly restricting though. Just some mild smoothing out properties. It surprisingly has a lot of stretch. When I first opened, I thought they were going to be very restrictive. It felt like they were conforming to my body. They are kind of thick fit leggings. Some leggings can be super thin and see through, but these were not.  For what they are, they are nice. This is why I’m giving a 3 stars despite not liking these. If you’re wanting this type of fabric, if you can call it that, I would recommend. If you don’t want to feel like a seal, I don’t recommend these. For me, there are far more positives than negative BUT the material really is a deal breaker.
These fit very good and are a very good color, would buy these again.
Fit great. Good quality product.  Soft and comfy.
Bought two colors. Great for walks and working in the yard.
I suffer from bilateral lymphedema in my legs which basically means one or both will randomly swell up. These are not see through, sort semi thick material, comfortable and fit well.

Overall a good fit and good fabric weight (not see thru and or flimsy.  The waist is just a smidge larger than I expected but going down a size wouldn’t make it fit better.  So just be prepared to tug the wast back in place with active exercise like my Jazzercise class.

I was skeptical about if these were in fact mid rise or not and was so happy to find out they truly are! I’m not a high rise girl and finding mid rise is hard right now. They are comfortable, don’t roll or ride because they are a bit thicker material. Wore today to class with lots of squats and no issues with them at all. Will be buying more colors!

评论概述: Normal Size, good material not see thru.
评论详情: Don’t listen to the reviews and size down but your normal size, also they don’t go to the ankle. Other than that great product soft nice material not thin or see through.
really gray and stretchy and too big

New favorite leggings. I am 5'6" ordered size small and they fit great. First pair of leggings that don't go all the way up to my chest. These go right above my belly button and that is what I prefer.

These are amazing!!! I usually don't write reviews but these are a total score. The fabric is elevated feeling and the fit is really flattering. The waist band is snug and stays in place without being too tight or constricting. (THANK YOU Amazon for making mid-rise tights, these are so hard to find!) the quality is comparable to a Lulu but they are so affordable! The length is a little closer to a 7/8 length but I'm also 5'10" and everything runs shorter on me... I've been buying Larges lately but the Medium fit me better so I'd say they run slightly larger compared to other brands. Overall amazing and great value!!
great fit
Good fit and quality Very comfortable

I have a short torso so I wish there were more mid range leggings available to purchase. High waisted leggings are just too high for me so I was excited to find these. The fit is great, but the fabric is a little shinier than I thought it would be. Also, since my thighs touch it makes a little switching sound when I walk lol! So these have become my inside leggings rather than for the gym. But they’re really comfortable!
Love these pants!  They are opaque and stay up.  They have great compression and thickness.  I’m pleased with the quality considering the price!! Would buy again!!
Feels great

Love the leggings. I find that a lot of leggings are so high rise that it’s too much but these are perfect! They are super stretchy but don’t stretch out as the day goes by. Super comfortable and pass the squat test for transparency.
They are perfect.  Not too thick,  not thin.  Feel awesome on, not compression, but still hold everything in. Want them in every color.

I love these leggings! I’m 2 months postpartum and I wear these all the time - they help keep the mom pooch under control 😂 But, my favorite thing about them is that they are fur resistant! I have a dog that sheds worse than anything I’ve ever seen and his fur is so hard to get off of most clothes but it wipes right off of these - it’s amazing!
Love these leggings. They have good tummy control and the fit is perfect! Love the color too! Great value for money!
The fit is not right, too big on waist and they loose all the time. Fabric is not starch enough and cheap quality.

评论概述: Leggings ripped and they are only 30 days old.
评论详情: I am so disappointed. I had previously ordered these leggings a few years ago and love them and they are still good even now, but the new pair that I just purchased ripped completely in the seat and I’ve only worn them twice. They must be by a different manufacturer. They are subpar quality. I’m so disappointed because I’m past my return date and I cannot use them so I paid for nothing. These are not the same quality as the original Amazon essentials leggings. I purchased two years ago. Very disappointed!

Imagine going into down dog and feeling the waist band sliding down in your hot yoga class… then almost falling because they were slippery and didn’t want to stay up . Higher waist than described. I quit trying to find petite fitting clothing. They look nice. Decent price. Just slippery. Not for me.

评论概述: I got these on sale for $7
评论详情: That is all.
La tela es gruesa y se adaptó a mi figura, lo recomiendo, vale cada dólar!
Nice and thick but flexible and comfortable. True mid waist fit, I bought a second pair!
Just wanted a pair of plain blue leggings and these are perfect. Very comfortable.
These feel like butter! I could live in these all day, everyday! Loved them so much I bought more!!
These leggings are not flattering at all on me. They are too loose in the legs and stop at a odd length.

I bought these during the sale and immediately bought a second pair after trying them on. They fit great, are super comfortable, and are very well made! This deal is too good to pass up! Highly recommend.

After tons of searching, I ordered these in M based on reviews and the size chart, and they surpassed my expectations. I wanted decent but inexpensive leggings for Jiu-Jitsu, and exercising, and these are great. I wasn't sure about the sizing, because I recently lost over 30 lbs, but the M fit me perfectly. For reference, I'm 5'4, about 161lbs, 29" waist 41" hips. These actually fit my hips and thighs, without being big on my waist which is usually an issue for me. Definitely recommend.
Size L fits a 5'5 ft. 136lbs.  I would say they were still pretty tight.

I wanted to love these especially for the price but they arrived in a bag that was full of dirt or some sort of yuck. Tried to look past that but after opening noticed the stitching on the leg already coming loose. They would not have made it through one wash. Returning.
These are probably my new favorite leggings. I love the stretch and the extra support at the waist. Also can’t beat the price. I will definitely be buying more

评论概述: I love these so much. But they didn’t last long
评论详情: These were one of my favorite leggings. I wore them probably once a week.  4 ish months later the stitching in the butt is unraveling and I can see holes.  Such a bummer.
the color looks like photo. The fit is as expected. I suggest just ordering your normal size. The length seems fine.  The material feels smooth!  Pretty happy with these!

评论概述: Been loving these leggings for years
评论详情: Amazon Essentials has been selling this cut and style for a few years now (under different listings, and sometimes slightly different fabrics) and they’re always great. Thick, supportive, perfect amount of stretch, and good quality especially for the price. I got worried that they discontinued them before, but I think the long pants just go on sale as summer approaches, and then they re-stock on the shorts / capris.  I buy 4-5 pairs of these at a time, and I wear them almost every day like it’s my uniform at this point, lol! They hold up great! Out of all the pairs I’ve had, only 2 have frayed at the seams a little after tons of washes, and I’m not delicate with my clothing at all.
I love the feel of them. They're so soft and comfy. I would definitely buy them again. They're comparable to other leggings that cost 3 times as much. Great buy! ❤️
really like the look
THESE LEGGINGS ARE NOT WHAT I THOUGHT THEY WERE, BUT I GUESS I DIDN'T READ CLOSELY ENOUGH. THEY RUN BIG, I WOULD RECOMMEND SIZING DOWN.
I needed leggings for my indoor sport and these were perfect for the price paid. Only thing I’m not a big fan of is the inseam in the crotch area but not a big deal
Very comfortable.
Feel great

Loved the price point.  I found the leggings to be thick enough, they were not see through.  For me, they were a little higher on the waist than I wanted, but that could be my own body type.  The reason I gave them a lower star rating is because they were constantly sliding down.  I spent all day pulling them up.
Bought for pajama bottom. Soft and comfortable.
Smelled like chemicals. Do not order.
THESE LEGGINGS ARE SO SOFT. ALMOST CAN'T EVEN TELL YOUR WEARING THEM. THESE ARE TRUE TO SIZE. I ORDERED A SIZE LARGER BUT SHOULD HAVE ORDERED MY USUAL SIZE. OVERALL HAPPY WITH PRODUCT.
Comfortable quality material. I want to buy more already in my cart.

评论概述: Very nice leggings…the sort of shiny lycra type
评论详情: I’m glad I found these Amazon essentials leggings. I’ve been very impressed by all of the Amazon essentials products I’ve purchased. I have been looking for a plain navy pair of leggings with no luck until it occurred to me to check Amazon. These are well made, a nice lightweight legging. The high waist is a bit cinched and they are long enough; which can be a challenge when you’re 5’11”. They arrived within 24 hours!
I wanted something cotton feeling. These were slick and tge waistband gapped for me.
I'm love material. They are actually full length which I have a difficult time finding.

I've ordered Amazon Essentials Women's Studio Sculpt High-Rise Capri Yoga Leggings before and really like them. I ordered these Active Sculpt Mid Rise leggings because they were full length.  Unfortunately, these leggings are a shiny material and show every flaw.  It seems they would be best suited for long, slender legs (of which mine are not).  Also, after trying them on, I definitely prefer the fit/look of the high rise (versus these mid rise) leggings.  I am returning these.
Thin but stretchy I got a 4x and love them!

评论概述: QUALITY CHECK YOUR ITEMS BEFORE THEY SHIP
评论详情: They were Capri's not full length not happy at all.
Great looking and material. Great fit on me.

I purchased these because the reviews said buttery soft and I was wanting a casual wear legging. I was surprised to find that they are quite shiny. I have an athletic build and large calves but they gap at the knees and ankles. I could have sized down. The waist band and thickness are good. Just not very flattering because the shiny material shows every flaw.
The fabric was sheer plastic.  I didn't even try it on.
fit my generous sized daughter well
Exactly as described. I’m a petite person so the mid rise leggings are better for me. Great fabric!
Love these leggings.  I will buy more?
These leggings are exactly what I have been looking for. Love the fit, material, and that they are midrise. I can't wear the high waist, too tight on my waist line.
They seemed a little thin in the butt area but I wear them under things so it worked out just fine for me.
The quality, material, and fit was great. They don't fall like other leggings and have stretch and good compression. And are not see-through. wish they had pockets though

These leggings are comparable to Nike leggings that I have spent twice as much on! The fabric is thick and soft. They are not see through or cheaply made. I did have to size up but will totally buy more in different colors!
That they fit just right
I have the capris in this line. The full lenght are just as pretty and comfortable.

These pants are a little smaller than the normal yoga pants that I get. The color is really bright pink...too bright for me. You will be easily spotted at the gym in this bright color! I will be returning.
Todo me gustó
Liked the color and length but the material was thin and see through
Love it
Exercise
These are comfy. But they were too long for me. The color is beyond amazing though!

TLDR: Seriously great stitching and material for the price!  I am so happy that I got these! I typically buy my leggings from Lane Bryant, but they run on the expensive side and I was tired of spending so much. I tried these to save some money and I’m so glad I did! They have great stitching, quality material, and fantastic shape all for a fraction of the Lane Bryant prices. Got these in olive (which look great with black tank tops) and am now planning which is my next color I will be getting.
Color spot on fit true to size - great incentive to hit the gym

I got these leggings and the matching sports bra and I LOVE them. I truly hate when they are dirty because its my favorite gym set. I would highly recommend. To me its similar quality and feel to lululemon at such a better price tag.
Stylish and comfortable!
Honestly, one of the best leggings I’ve ever bought

I liked these leggings and found them to be very comfortable. They are not the tummy control type of material that suck everything in. I like to have both in my closet because there are days where I want everything sucked in, and other days where I'm just more worried about comfort. These are for those days. I feel like they overall fit great and true to size. I have large calves and noticed when pulling them up that area of the pants seems more restricting then most. But they still fit and I was happy with the quality!

These are soft to the touch and not see through. Be mindful of the size. I’ve lost a couple of pounds and now need to give these away because as I walk and move around they sag. The color is really nice and the fabric is soft so that you can’t feel the stitching like other cheap brands.
I love these leggings! They hold up to washing/drying without seam stretching or pulling. They are also soft and are thick enough that I feel ok wearing them to the store!
They are way too big and would have liked an exchange but I missed the return window.  Anyway, size down.

评论概述: Wish it had a bigger pocket for my phone, but they're comfy and supportive.
评论详情: They fit perfectly; they don't ride up, roll down or fall off. They're true to size- feel and look like a good stretchy comfortable material with the waistband being supportive while feeling better quality than others at this price. I would prefer it if they had a side pocket large enough for a typical phone size with accompanying case.  But overlooking that, the black is a true black and the material not being sheer at all is perfect for me. They're breathable but warm and it’s hard to find a good pair of leggings at this price. So, knowing it’s from Amazon and all the benefits that come with that, I’ll look for these here again in the future. Though I’m sure these will last for years to come.

I wanted these in XL but they were only available in 1x, so I gave them a shot. They're definitely larger than I prefer, but they still wear well (they're loose through the waist and thighs on me, but the booty and calves fit great, and they're long enough for my 5'10" frame). The material is cool and comfortable, and the navy blue is definitely squat-proof. There are no pockets, which is frustrating because I can't carry my keys or phone in them, but I knew that when I ordered them (still bitter about it, though😁). They wash well (I use warm water and hang to dry).  These are nice leggings at a good price. They don't compare to Lulus or UA, in my opinion, but they're pretty darn good for yoga and less than 1/3 the price of the other brands. I would order again at this price point.
They're ok, but a poor fit.  Super baggy in the knees and ankles, yet perfect fit on the hips and waist - very weird proportions.

评论概述: A little loose in the waist
评论详情: I normally wear  a 12 or 14, but I often find that leggings my size are uncomfortably tight. I decided to try these to see if going up a size would make them more comfortable. The butt and legs fit pretty well, but in comparison the waist is big. The combination of loose waist and tighter legs means they have a tendency to pull down a bit. It’s not terrible, but I do find myself repeatedly pulling them up. These are heavy and not at all see through. I tried bending and squatting in bright sunlight, and my husband said that nothing shows through. These smelled bad when they arrived. It wasn’t really a chemical smell, but something akin to a faint vomit smell. Gross. One wash fixed that, and they washed up nicely. They are soft and comfortable and quite warm. Mine came with a loose thread, but all stitching seems to be in place. Other than the size issue I find these very comfortable. I’m 5’9” with an average inseam. These pants hit a couple inches above my ankle. I do find these warm while working out, but I don’t find them overly hot even though they are thick enough not to be see through.
Bought these for my daughter for under her shorts for track. Perfect fit!
These are nice leggings that fit me well. They seem to be well made with no obvious defects. They have laundered well with no seams coming unraveled or anything like that.

These pants have that kind of shiny fabric that swishes when it rubs against itself. I don’t love that. Also it came with an icky smell so I definitely would wash before wearing.  Aside from those couple things, they seem good. Nice and thick, no see-through spots. There’s a tiny pocket also - a nice detail you don’t always find in leggings or workout pants.

Pleasantly surprised to find they fit well, maybe even a bit too loose. I know this is a popular fabric for leggings, especially for excercise, but I am not a fan. That being said, it's better than some similar ones I've tried. I didn't think they were nearly as stretchy as most, but were definitely big enough without it.
Very comfortable and they hug your body in the right way. They are a tad bit on the long side. I’m 5’7 and the bottom on the leggings lays on top of my foot. They wash well and there is no shrinkage.

As described.i ordered these in 1X based on their sizing chart. Theyre slightly bigger in the waist, belly and crotch areas with some sagging and pooching from the slack. they stretch but have that 90s spandex feel and sheen to them,so they stretch out a bit and don't snap back. i washed these on hot and dried on medium heat to shrink them a bit.hopefully that will work. my normal size in leggings is a 16/18 or a 1x.but these feel like a 2x.so IMO they run slightly larger.

These leggings are very comfortable, very well made and fit perfect. The material is light weight and they look great with your favorite t-shirt or tank. The price was very good and I will be getting more of these in different colors. I highly recommend these Amazon Essentials Women's Active Sculpt Mid Rise Full Length Leggings!
I've not washed these yet, but I love the feel of the fabric. I do wish they had pockets for my phone, but there is a little tiny pocket on the inside of the legging. Love the olive green color

These leggings are super comfortable and fit well for width, but I was expecting full-size leggings and these are almost capri length for a 5'8" girl. The material seems well made. It's not a cotton legging, more of spandex type material that is shinier and stretchable.  Overall, a nice legging, I just wish it were longer.

Incredibly soft, and high end performance material, very comparable to far more expensive brands. Fit as expected, and well constructed. There is a waist band pocket large enough for a debit/credit card, id, and a key. Overall I felt this legging is extremely well priced versus its comparable.

I have a lot (upwards of 25+) pairs of very colorful and patterned leggings but I didn't have any basic black.  I got these and put them on and now I am in love with them!.  They are not tight in the wrong places (muffin tops and camel you know) but gently hug your curves.  And I am not constantly yanking them up or having to adjust them.  They feel great on!

These leggings are much thicker and more supportive than I expected. I'm used to cheapy thin/cotton leggings, and this performance material has stretch and substance. I did find them a little warmer than my usual leggings, and the leg holes fall at a strange place on my ankle (it's hard for me to find pants in general, I'm a tall woman). But the fit was pretty much as expected, and my weird legs aside they are very comfortable. Once the weather turns more fall-ish I can see myself getting them out on a daily basis and buying a couple more pairs.

I have another pair of Amazon Essentials workout pants and they ran SUPER small. I wrongly assumed that these would run similarly. However, these run fairly true to size. I sized up 2 sizes since there was no other size guidance when I ordered and they are baggy on me.  Despite the sizing mess up on my part, these are good quality and a nice medium weight that comes in fun colors. If these were the right size, I'm not certain they'd pass the "squat test" without issue due to the medium rise and the slip of the material, but they are otherwise great pants at a reasonable price.  I should've gone with my recommended size but they are still wearing for just lounging around the house comfortably.

In love with this leggings. First of all the material is so so soft it feels like butter. The leggings stay in places while walking and don’t roll around the tummy area. The opening on the top is perfect for my keys or my chapstick. So lightweight and breathable. I will be ordering again

I like how the leggings fit with the exception of where the leg ends. These land above my ankles and every other pair of full-length leggings I own land below my ankles. I ordered the leggings in French Blue - such a fun color.  I tested the medium-weight fabric by bending over while wearing dark-colored underwear. My husband wasn't able to tell me the color of my underwear.  It's nice that the leggings have a small pocket for a key. It's not a feature I have ever used. I'd love these leggings more if they had full-sized pockets to hold my wallet and cell phone.
